mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(bno, title, name, password, content) VALUES(board_no_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{name}, #{password}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, name, regdate, readcount FROM board ORDER BY bno DESC OFFSET 10 ROWS FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, A.* FROM (SELECT bno, title, name, regdate, readcount FROM board ORDER BY bno DESC) A) B WHERE rnum between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
SELECT bno, title, name, content, regdate, readcount FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET readcount=readcount+1 WHERE bno=#{bno}
mapper.delete: DELETE board WHERE bno=#{bno} AND password=#{password}
